id.label: Id
id.invalidFeedback: The Id must be unique and only contain letters, numbers dashes or underscore.

360Deg.label: 360 Degree
360Deg.text: Only Pages displaying an Image or a Video can be in panorama or 360 modus.

name.label: Name
name.notFound: Could not find this media file: <1>{{file}}</1>. Please add it in the <3>Media Dialog</3>

sourceForm.sizeInfo:
If you set the size of the media here, the script will know the actual size of the media even before it's fully loaded. Then the user won't see any resizing when the media is loaded.
The sizes you set here are intrinsic (natural) sizes and for images and videos it is recommended to leave them as they are, because this application automatically reads the sizes from the image- or video-file. That is not possible with media objects like iframes.

width.label: Width
width.invalidFeedback: The Width must be between 0 and the intrinsic width of the media

height.label: Height
height.invalidFeedback: The Height must be between 0 and the intrinsic height of the media

position.label: Position
position.text_media: The $t(translation:inlineObject) is positioned relative to the media (moves while scrolling)
position.text_page: The $t(translation:inlineObject) is positioned relative to the page (does not move while scrolling)

inlineObjectForm.sizeFormText: The coordinates are relative to the media / page

goto.label: Goto / target id
goto.invalidFeedback: Please select a target id from the list
